snippet.title: CORE KEEPER BAGS & BLASTS - COMING MARCH 10TH (ESRB)
snippet.description:
Explorers, get ready to dig into some brand new Core Keeper content! We’re very happy to announce that Core Keeper: Bags & Blasts, the first big update for the game since launch, will be available on all platforms on March 10th 2025.

Awaken as an explorer in a long-forgotten cavern teeming with treasures and secrets. Harvest relics and resources, craft advanced tools, build your base, and explore over 9 unique biomes in a dynamically evolving world just waiting to be unearthed. Craft new tools, grow your garden, fish in mysterious waters, master recipes, hatch pets, drive vehicles, encounter the Cavelings, level up your skills, and defeat legendary Titans to unveil the power of the Core. 

Core Keeper is available on Steam, PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Game Pass, Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One and Nintendo Switch.  

Download on Steam: https://bit.ly/472ESAs 
Download on Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/pro...
Download on PlayStation 5 & 4: https://store.playstation.com/en-gb/c... 
Download on Xbox One and Series X|S: https://www.xbox.com/en-gb/games/stor...
